public class Login extends Activity {
private Button btn;
@Override
protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data) {
    // TODO Auto-generated method stub
    super.onActivityResult(requestCode, resultCode, data);
    Session.getActiveSession().onActivityResult(this, requestCode,
            resultCode, data);
    Bundle bundle = data.getExtras();
    for (String key : bundle.keySet()) {
        String ss = key + " => " + bundle.get(key) + ";";
        System.out.println(ss);
    }
}

@Override
protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
    setContentView(R.layout.login);
    btn = (Button) findViewById(R.id.button1);
    btn.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
        @Override
        public void onClick(View v) {
            getvideodat();
        }
    });
    // showHashKey(this);
    LoginButton authButton = (LoginButton) findViewById(R.id.authButton);
    authButton.setReadPermissions(Arrays.asList("user_likes",
            "user_status", "user_videos"));
    authButton.setUserInfoChangedCallback(new UserInfoChangedCallback() {
        @Override
        public void onUserInfoFetched(GraphUser user) {
            if (user != null) {
                call();
            } else {
            }
        }
    });
}

private void getvideodat() {
    Session session = Session.getActiveSession();
    // Bundle params = new Bundle();
    // params.putString("source", "{video-data}");
    // /* make the API call */
    // new Request(
    // session,
    // "/534383099925612/videos",
    // params,
    // HttpMethod.POST,
    // new Request.Callback() {
    // public void onCompleted(Response response) {
    // System.out.println(response);
    // /* handle the result */
    // }
    // }
    // ).executeAsync();

    new Request(session, "/me/videosvideos?type=uploaded", null,
            HttpMethod.GET, new Request.Callback() {
                public void onCompleted(Response response) {
                    System.out.println(response);
                    /* handle the result */
                }
            }).executeAsync();
}

private void call() {
    Session session = Session.getActiveSession();
    Request request = new Request(session, "/me", null, HttpMethod.GET,
            new Request.Callback() {
                public void onCompleted(Response response) {
                    getFBresonce(response);
                    // httpRequestToFB();
                }
            });
    Request.executeBatchAsync(request);
}

private void getFBresonce(Response response) {

    GraphObject responseGraphObject = response.getGraphObject();
    JSONObject json = responseGraphObject.getInnerJSONObject();
    // get your values
    String mname = json.optString("first_name");
    String msurname = json.optString("last_name");
    String mid = json.optString("id");
    String dob = json.optString("birthday");
    String email = json.optString("email");
    String msex = json.optString("gender");
    if (email != null) {
        String memail = email;
    }
    if (dob != null) {
        // Locale locale = stringToLocale(json.optString("locale"));
        SimpleDateFormat dateFormatter = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy");
        try {
            Date date = dateFormatter.parse(dob);
            Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();
            cal.setTime(date);
            int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH);
            int currectmonth = month + 1;
            String mmm = Integer.toString(currectmonth);
            int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH);
            String mdd = Integer.toString(day);
            int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR);
            String myyyy = Integer.toString(year);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

}

thats working fine no need to open every time facebook fragment use graph API
